q_ch: 2024年4月30日前完成的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: What cutting tasks will be completed before April 30, 2024?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that will be completed before April 30, 2024. I've organized them into a neat table for you! 📅✂️

| Task ID | End Time           | Working Group Name   |
|---------|--------------------|----------------------|
| 1       | January 18, 2024   | Master Sewers        |
| 2       | February 2, 2024   | Master Cutters       |
| 3       | January 19, 2024   | Master Cutters       |
| 4       | January 17, 2024   | Master Sewers        |
| 5       | February 2, 2024   | Master Sewers        |
| 6       | March 20, 2024     | Master Cutters       |
| 7       | March 6, 2024      | Master Sewers        |
| 8       | March 8, 2024      | Expert Cutters       |
| 9       | March 6, 2024      | Master Cutters       |
| 10      | March 29, 2024     | Master Cutters       |
| 11      | March 21, 2024     | Expert Cutters       |
| 12      | March 27, 2024     | Professional Cutters |
| 13      | March 27, 2024     | Master Sewers        |
| 14      | March 18, 2024     | Professional Cutters |
| 15      | March 26, 2024     | Master Sewers        |
| 16      | April 10, 2024     | Expert Cutters       |
| 17      | March 25, 2024     | Master Sewers        |
| 18      | April 7, 2024      | Precision Cutters    |
| 19      | April 12, 2024     | Expert Cutters       |
| 20      | April 15, 2024     | Expert Cutters       |
| 21      | April 4, 2024      | Expert Cutters       |
| 22      | April 9, 2024      | Master Sewers        |
| 23      | April 19, 2024     | Master Cutters       |
| 24      | April 23, 2024     | Master Cutters       |
| 30      | April 26, 2024     | Precision Cutters    |

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE ct.end_time < '2024-04-30';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks that have an end time before April 30, 2024
